thread.section_title: Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Stellenbosch, South Africa) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Central position, Quality hotel !!
thread.title_full: Central position, Quality hotel !! - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: Linda D
title: Central position, Quality hotel !!
text:
This hotel was really central in Stellenbosch so easy to stroll around and explore. Some communal areas of the hotel were a little small but this added to the charm. Our room (201) was well positioned and equipped and our peaceful balcony area overlooked the pool. Parking was provided which is a 'must' as public street- parking is hard to find. Service was good and we ate at the hotel restaurant on the front terrace which we would recommend . Did not have time to see the spa - maybe next time
